title: How To Center an Element Vertically

content.text: Learn how to center an element vertically and horizontally with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to center an element vertically and horizontally with CSS.

content.text: I am vertically and horizontally centered.

syntaxHighlighting.text:
height: 200px;  position: 
  relative;  border: 3px solid green;

content.code: I am vertically centered.

syntax_highlighting.text:
height: 200px;  position: 
  relative;  border: 3px solid green;

content.code_html:
<style>
.container {
  height: 200px;
  position: relative;
  border: 3px solid green;
}

.vertical-center {
  margin: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
  transform: translateY(-50%);
}
</style>

<div class="container">
  <div class="vertical-center">
    <p>I am vertically centered.</p>
  </div>
</div>

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
height: 200px;  position: 
  relative;  border: 3px solid green;

content.text: How To Center Vertically AND Horizontally

syntaxHighlighting.text:
height: 200px;  position: 
  relative;  border: 3px solid green;

content.code: I am vertically and horizontally centered.

syntax_highlighting.text:
height: 200px;  position: 
  relative;  border: 3px solid green;

content.code_html:
<style>
.container {
  height: 200px;
  position: relative;
  border: 3px solid green;
}

.center {
  margin: 0;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  -ms-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
</style>

<div class="container">
  <div class="center">
    <p>I am vertically and horizontally centered.</p>
  </div>
</div>

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
height: 200px;  position: 
  relative;  border: 3px solid green;

content.text: You can also use flexbox to center things:
content.html: You can also use flexbox to center things:

content.code_html:
.center {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  height: 200px;
  border: 3px solid green;
}

content.html: Tip: Go to our CSS Align Tutorial to learn more about aligning elements.
